1151.content:
You’ve tried to live a good life… and see where that has gotten you?

You’ve never eaten another Pokemon before. There are very few truly carnivorous species of Pokemon -- most all Pokemon were omnivorous, floatzels included. The berries of this forest provided all the protein and essential nutrients one could ask for, and thus eating meat was considered evil and pointless. Thus, in the forest you call home, all the Pokemon have been strictly vegetarian for generations, and eating others was unheard of. You, on the other hand, have always been… different from other Pokemon.

You loved eating. While all the other Pokemon of the forest were busy socializing, you were hidden away, alone in your den, feasting on all the berries and food items you could find. It was an unparalleled thrill to fill your belly to the absolute limit, and to feel your body grow thicker as a result of your massive meals. Unfortunately, as you grew older, this had diminishing returns. Berries weren’t particularly fattening, and were difficult to find in large numbers. The longer your went hungry, the more… tempting your darker desires became. Nobody would notice if you just chewed up a single Rattatta… right?

Just as you were about to give in, you fell in love. She was a vaporeon, and she was perfect. She was the only person in the forest you ever enjoyed being with, and you quickly forgot all about your gluttonous urges, so enraptured by your romance. For years the two of you lived in harmony, and every night you would lay beneath the stars, and she would talk about the future you were going to have together, and all your future cubs, or just whisper in your ear how she loved you so...

Of course, like all good things, it came to an end. A charizard attacked the forest while you were out collecting those damnable berries. You didn’t even get to be there when she sacrificed herself to save the forest. According to the witnesses, the charizard swallowed her whole. You didn't even know that was possible. You had always just fantasized about cooking up another Pokemon as a regular meal... but swallowing them whole, while they were still alive? That was another thing completely. Just the idea of a whole Pokemon held captive in a huge, bulging stomach, struggling and screaming while they were slowly ground down into fat...

As you walked, you suddenly realized you had grown painfully erect. This was nothing new; fantasizing about Pokemon getting eaten always got you going like nothing else. Normally, you would feel ashamed in yourself. After all, who would fantasize about something so cruel? But this time, you just felt numb. You had lost the only Pokemon you had ever loved, and since then, you had just been wandering through the forest aimlessly, languishing in your loneliness and misery. You had been so lonely since your lover had been taken from you, and this being mating season, your libido has been driving you crazy. Why not enjoy yourself a little bit?

Not noticing anybody nearby, you slipped into some nearby bushes. Now with a modicum of privacy, you sit down, leaning up against a tree, and eagerly take your shaft in your hand. At first, your fantasies were innocent; just reminiscing about how you and vaporeon would make love beneath the stars every mating season, trying for a pregnancy that never came to be. But as you stroked faster and faster, your fantasies grew darker. Your heart leaped in your chest as you looked down on your belly and imagined some small Pokemon wriggling around inside, screaming futilely for help as they were being churned at by your big, powerful stomach. You even thought about the fate of your lover in the belly of that charizard, perversely excited by the knowledge that she was digested slowly in the body of that much stronger predator. You knew it was wrong to think about, but you just desperately needed release. Any second now…

Just as relief was about to hit you, you were knocked from your stupor by the sound of movement. Your pleasure was instantly replaced by fear when you realized that another Pokemon had been nearby this entire time! You peak out of the bushes, to see a lopunny had set up a basket in the field in front of you, humming happily as she picked berries from the bushes. Luckily, she was facing the opposite direction, so it seemed she hadn’t spotted what you had been doing. You were about to just sneak away and pretend that this had never happened… when the unaware, and very obviously female, Pokemon bent over to pick some herbs, giving you a clear look under her tail.

Instantly, your excitement returned to you. Without even thinking, you reached back to stroke at your shaft once more, watching the cheerful lopunny from your perch. For some reason, seeing a pokemon right in front of you made your gluttonous fantasies seem all the more real. All the meat on the lopunny's curvy body looked like she'd make for a filling meal, and after a bit of sautéing you're sure it'd be delicious. As pleasure overtook you, your rational thinking abilities were blurred by your fantasies. Surely, you could just devour her… right? She was all alone, and nobody would suspect you were involved if she disappeared.

She appeared to be about to finish picking berries, so it was now or never. Your fantasies took control of you, driving you to do things you didn't even know were possible. How do you end up devouring the rabbit?
1151.title: The Widower

11511.content:
You have always had a plan in mind for if you ever decided to do something like this; take the Pokemon out with an ice fang to the neck before they even saw it coming, and then prepare the meat into a delicious roasted feast. However, another thought was dominated your clouded mind; what if you swallowed her whole, just like the charizard had? Was that even possible? The lopunny was almost your size… but you’d swallowed huge objects in the past, so it might be possible to gulp her down. Couldn’t hurt to try, right?

You were bursting with excitement as you snuck up behind your prey, knowing that the lopunny’s existence would soon come to an end, one way or another. She was always annoyingly bubbly and optimistic for your taste, even compared to the other denizens of the forest. She’d serve much better as meat in your belly. Just as you were about to pounce, she noticed you in her peripheral vision. “Oh, hello!” She said, not even bothering to turn around and look at you as she continued bending over to pick at the grass, giving you an enchanting view. “I’m sorry, were you going to pick these berries?”

You were surprised that she noticed you, but only grinned when you realized she was still unaware. “... no,” you reply, deadpan.

She seems to perk up as she recognizes your voice. “Oh! Floatzel, it’s you,” she says, as if she’s had something she wanted to say. She wipes her hands as she finishes up her harvesting work, talking sadly as she turned to you. “Listen, I heard about what happened, and I wanted to express my condolences-” Her sentence stopped suddenly, as she looked down at your crotch. Her eyes widened and she blushed fiercely, as if she had just seen something she shouldn’t have. “Oh, uh… I’m sorry, I think I should go…”

“Nonsense,” you smile cordially, hugging the lopunny close, your burning, hard shaft pressing up against her unbelievably soft fur. “Wasn’t there something you were going to say?”

She looked stunned by your forwardness, but not frightened. You remember that she’s been single for as long as you can remember. Maybe she’s been fantasizing about something like this? “... I… just wanted to say...” She stuttered, blushing and gasping at the feeling of your member. “I’m sorry what happened to vaporeon… a-and… if there’s anything you need…”

“There is something I needed, actually,” you smile, before bringing the lopunny’s head lower. She thinks you were going to bring her to your crotch, but instead, you pressed her head against your empty belly. It gurgled loudly, signifying your hunger. “My belly hasn’t gotten a real meal in… forever, actually. And I think I’ve found just the solution.” She looks confused for a moment, before she gazes up and notices the deeply hungry look in your eyes. She seemed to realize your attention, trying to push away from your big, gurgling belly.

“What? Let go!” She said, trying futilely to break free from your grasp, but it was far too late. You stretched your jaws as wide as you could on such short notice, forcing the Pokemon’s head inside your maw before they are able to call for help. “Mmph!” is all her muffled voice can yell from within the confines, her immense ears pressed against the top of your mouth. Just having her head in your mouth filled you with a profound sense of domination, but there was still the matter of fitting her down your throat. You grab onto her arms, restraining them against her sides as you attempt to force her head into your neck. You’d swallowed watmel berries; you were sure you could handle this! But no matter how hard you tried, you just couldn’t get her to fit.

After about ten minutes of the two of you struggling around the field, you finally manage to fit the lopunny’s head into your throat. The bones of your throat pushed forward, making room for your meal and displaying an ample bulge in your neck. If your mouth wasn’t full, you would cheer in celebration. This just might be possible! Your throat muscles grab onto her with a vice-like grip, undulating around her snout powerfully as she roll her further and further into your body. Luckily, the lopunny doesn’t seem to have any shoulders to speak of, so it should all get easier from here. Even though she’s roughly your height, she’s much lighter, so you can easily lift her up and let gravity work her further and further down your throat.

She finds herself descending with terrifying speed, every moment sending her a few centimeters closer to her doom. The excitement in your mind dulled as you were forced to deal with the reality of the situation; forcing live, squirming prey down your neck was much more difficult than swallowing berries. It took another twenty minutes to just force her in up to her elbows, which had the added bonus of restricting her arms to her side, preventing her from pulling away. At this point, her head disappeared behind your chest, and her chances of escaping were looking dimmer and dimmer. After a half hour of work total, the hardest part was over; her entire upper body had been stuffed, bit by bit, into your throat, her head finally entering your stomach, pressed into a pool of noxious liquids.

By now, the only part left of her to swallow was her hips and kicking legs, still hanging in the air from your maw. She was exhausted by this point, made drowsy by the relative lack of oxygen inside of you. At this point, you could do whatever you wanted. You walked over and sat down, leaning against that very same tree as you started pawing yourself off again, licking between your prey’s thighs, sending your tongue all over her delicious, round rump as she kicked her furry legs in the air. The whole experience of swallowing the lopunny had been intoxicating; you honestly just felt light-headed at this point, overwhelmed by it all. You pressed a paw against your belly, realizing you could feel the lopunny’s head inside. You almost chuckled. Looks like it was time to finish this off.

You leaned your head back, letting gravity do the work of finally sliding the last of the lopunny down your throat. This time, the process was much faster, your throat having become accustomed to holding the larger prey. Eventually, a sense of community bloomed from the plaza, and spread through the entire forest. Now, everybody knows everybody else, and everybody tries to help one another and live in peace.

You hated it here. You felt so out of place, like a visitor from another world. All these Pokemon of all kinds with big smiles on their faces, content with their boring, peaceful lives… you didn’t understand them. No matter how cold or rude you acted towards your neighbors, they were all so kind to you, convinced that they could become your friends with enough persistence. Why were they so trusting? All sorts of Pokemon wave at you as you walk by, or express their condolences over your recent loss, or invite your for dinner, or try to have a chat… you ignored them all. You had a one-track mind, and you came here for a singular purpose.

The plaza was built up from an empty field by the forest’s largest lake. The buildings were mostly big wooden structures, painted to resemble various Pokemon. Every time you passed through, you saw Pokemon dancing, singing, and being merry, as if every day they lived was cause for celebration. You couldn’t help but lick your lips stealthily over some of the pedestrians walking around. There were Pokemon here that you had never spoken to before, but they looked absolutely delicious. 12321.title: A pond full of Magikarp (Prey)

123211.content: The Magikarp was twice the size of a normal one. Which only made you want to eat it more. So you dive into the water and capture it. After licking you lips, you open your mouth wide and shallow the last Magikarp. You can still feel the squirming of the Magikarps in your belly. But you still hunger for more to eat. So you continue with your quest of eating more. After a while, you find....
123211.title: One Magikarp was still left. (Prey)

1232111.content: You find a field of nice and ripe watermelons. There were hundreds of them. But you had a big strong to (not so) fill. So not wanting to wait you take one watermelon and swallow it whole. Not even eating it regalurily. Just rind, seeds, and all. You continue to eat more and more watermelons. Your belly was getting packed by so much of them, your belly was starting to look lumpy. Still, you chose to inhale more melons. After a few hours, you empty the field and now your body was heavier as well as twice your last size. Not satified, you wanted some more to eat. So you waddle out to find....
1232111.title: A field of watermelons.

12321111.content: You see at least 3 trees stocked with oran berries. You felt that it was enough, but you were still willing to want to eat all of them. You go to one tree and make quick work by chowing down on each berry. You did the same for the second tree. By the third tree, you pick all the berries and shallowed them whole. As you finish the oran berries, you are a bit disappointed that your size didn't really increase much. Your belly still looks lumpy because of the watermelons. So you decide to take a break for a few and make your stomach digust. After a couple minutes, most of the food you ate digested and now your belly was smooth and shushing up and down. Mainly cause of all the watermelons. You love the feeling and still want more food. So you go out to find.....
12321111.title: Some berries on trees.

123211111.content: There were at least 30 Seedots in the group. Since Seedot look like acorns to you, you think of them as living acorns. Which made wanting to eat them even better for you. So you grab one of the Seedot. It starts to weep, but you don't care and eat it. The rest of the Seedots try to run, but you didn't want them to escape. You use whirlpool and suck all the Seedots into a water vortex. When that was done, you put the vortex over your head and let all the Seedot drop into your mouth like a funnel. Just like that, all the Seedot was in your belly now. But you still hunger for more. With your massive size, you can handle any situation. But now you want to eat more and more. You travel more to find.....
123211111.title: A group of Seedot.(Prey)

1232111112.content:
The orchard was filled with so much trees each with a large amount of apples. You couldn't count them all. Since you were taller than all the trees, getting the apples would be no problem for you.

"All of you apples, GET IN MY BELLY." You shouted.

You go to each tree gulping down apple after apple. Finishing tree after tree. At one point, you starting inhaling all the apples down your throat. The apples broke off their stems and flew into your mouth by the load. You stopped after you realized there were no apples left and you were as wide as half the orchard. You pat your belly on a another job well done. You, of course still want to increase your ginormous size even more. So you ar on you way again. The ground shakes with every step you make. You go out to find.....
1232111112.title: A Orchard of Apples (Weight Gain)

12321111121.content:
You then see a huge lake in the distance. Its filled with many, many fish Pokemon, like Magickarps, Remorides, Goldeen and Seakings.

"Mhhhh, this will be nice. You gonna have a nice trip, in my Belly!" you pat your belly and walk closer to the Lake

The fish Pokemon having a good time, untill there are quakes, the water shakes so heavy that some of it even spalshes on the ground as waves and the light goes dark as you then loom over them.

You then sink your head into the Water and open your Mouth which makes immidetly a Vortex and all gets dragged into the Whirlpool and into your behemoth Mouth, swallowing them easily and your grow in a extreamly fast Rate.

Nothing could stop you untill your finished with your next Snack, bloating immensly into a gigantic blob, from at least 30ft into 55ft of size.

"Yes! That was nice, but far from being enough" you said happly and shaking your belly sexy and then pat your belly one more time.

You look up in the Sky then and notice that the Day is far from being over "Ahhh nice. Plenty of time left fro me to eat and get bigger" you said with a smile.

You look around then and see two places to go. A Big Forrest and a Beach, you choose to go.....
12321111121.title: A lake with fish pokemon. (Prey)

info.brief_description: You are a Floatzel, and you are hungry for some pokemon!
info.description:
This is my next interactive story for pokemon vore. In this story you choose to be either a male or female Floatzel, and you go on a eating rampage! But be careful though, other big pokemon want to try and eat you as well. However if you are able to, you will might find a growth gem that will make you bigger. I have managed to find the out the names of the fifth generation pokemon and if you want to know what they are, go to www.serebii.net (this is where I got them from).

It contains:

Soft Vore
Anal Vore
Cock Vore(only if you or an attacking predator is male)
Unbirthing(only if you or an attacking predator is female)
Tube vore (a vore move your Floatzel character will have. It is similar to soft vore but it goes from the mouth to a small opening from the inflatable tube)
No poke anthros.
No Humans.

If you are offended by this content, leave this story immediately! You have been warned.
info.pretty_title: Floatzel's growth, weight gain, and vore
